features: Waterproof, breathable H2No® Performance Standard shell; warm, snap-out high-pile fleece jacket; shell and fleece can be worn together or separately
Shell has a snap-off, three-panel hood with a gusset for a snug fit and weather protection; reflective patch on back of hood
Full-length zipper on shell has reflective zipper pulls and a wind flap that secures with snaps
Shell has raglan sleeves for mobility, reflective patches and hook-and-loop adjustable tabs at cuffs seal out drafts; two handwarmer pockets keep hands toasty
Snap-out high-pile fleece jacket attaches to shell with loops at the neck and sleeves of waterproof shell
Fleece snap-out jacket has a stand-up collar, snapped placket and two handwarmer pockets
For durability, there’s stretchy binding at the collar, placket edge, sleeve openings and hem of the snap-out fleece jacket; Fair Trade Certified™ sewn
